title: KODAK 60 cm (24 inch) HD Ready LED TV  (24HDX100S)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 TV Unit, Remote, 2 AAA Batteries, User Manual
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product & 6 Months on Accessories
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Defect Arising Out of Faulty or Defective Material or Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: The Product is Not Used According to Instructions given in the Instruction Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature is Made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Installation or Repair Work is Carried Out by Persons or Agency Other than Authorized by the Company. Site (Premises Where the Product is Kept) Conditions that do not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. Original Serial Number is Removed, Obliterated or Altered from the Machine or Cabinet. Defects due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightning, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to Service Centre or Purchaser's Residence. The Warranty does not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag Etc). Dust appearing on television panel after 10 days of usage, mentioned in the Operating Instruction Manual Supplied with this Product or Any Cosmetic Parts
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: This product does not require installation. The features of the product are presented in the user manual that comes with it. Hence, the manufacturer does not provide on-site installation or demo for the product. In case of any queries about the installation or the features of product, kindly call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance.

product_description.A+ Panel: The Zero Dot A+ Grade Panel of this TV, with the brightness of 300 nits and a refresh rate of 60 Hz, helps in delivering vivid and lifelike visuals on the screen.
product_description.Wide-viewing Angle: It has a 178-degree wide-viewing angle, allowing you to watch this TV from almost any angle without experiencing any distortion in the picture quality.

review: Good picture quality ,value with money .. quality product & weight is very small ... handy .. I am felling love with this tv

I have been using the tv for more than 2 months.
The tv is brilliant at this price point.
Good things:
The size is compact with good viewing angles. The overall build quality of the tv is good. The display clarity is good along with the colour reproduction. HD channels is recommended for best experience. USB port is available to connect your phone/pendrive. The user interface is simple and won't confuse first time user. The sound is loud enough for 20 sqft room.
Bad things:
The remote build quality could have been better but not a deal breaker. The speakers can be improved by adding more bass.
Good Television and i Purchased Big billion sell very low cost. Impressive quality. And great service by kodak. Thank you.
the colour seems to be quite in the bright mode.....sound system is okay..... overall in the price range it is a awesome buy.... thank you seller and Flipkart

Excellent and A1 product. Picture quality is dynamic and sound quality is such that I personally feel there is no difference between an original human sound and the sound coming out of the TV set. It's such an awesome product within this price range. Regarding Flipkart, their delivery is very punctual and safe delivery. Thank you.

Brought for monitor purpose. Working like a charm. Wanted to spend 6k for monitor but thought to have a Dual purpose stuff - TV and Monitor. Very compact to place on your work table. Delivery was superb as promised.

Just a good old 24inch TV you can find in the market at the moment with surprisingly cheaper rate. Does the job if you are just looking for a TV in some spare space you've got. The colors are vibrant but it's just an LED TV with barebone specs. Can't really complaint for the price.
Best picture quailty compare to mi

I got the TV yesterday.the TV is superb but it's resolution is a bit less.i had bought a TV named adsun (24 inch) before this product,compared to that this TV has less resolution and brightness.i think the color reproduction is not satisfactory.still the TV is value for money at this price range 😁.

The only issue I faced is that ,some accessories were Missing.i got only one TV stand ,the other is missing.so I adjusted the left side by placing it on top of old remote control.the batteries they mentioned in the description were also missing.its really funny thinking what they did with my one TV stand 😂 and what am I supposed to do with the other😂🤣.

Keeping everything aside,this TV is a good product for the price segment 🤩(I'm giving it a 3 star coz I didn't get one stand)
